subject: Fwd: Thank you for your recent refinance debt request, we are ready to lend you some cash
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you TODAY (hurry, this tender will expire THIS EVENING):
$399,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply finish this plain form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit score will not disqualify you!
http://doubleransalt.com/
